item.title: Setting up a Raspberry Pi 2 Samba server (in early January 2016)
item.description: Instructions on how to setup a Raspberry Pi 2 Samba server with a Seagate Backup Plus Slim 1TB.

item.title: Google Services on the Amazon Fire HD 8
item.description: For my future reference, information on how to install Google services (Google Play and associated services) on an Amazon Fire HD 8.

item.title: Example libGDX orthographic camera controller
item.description: The following class can be used in a libGDX project as a framework for your own orthographic camera controller.

item.title: Configuring a libGDX project to run as a desktop application in Android Studio
item.description: The following will quickly cover how to setup a newly imported libGDX project to run a desktop application, via Android Studio 1.1.0.

item.title: Creating your first libGDX project with Android Studio 1.1.0
item.description: How to start using libGDX with Android Studio 1.1.0.

item.title: Enabling ADB on a Lenovo A7600-F TAB A10
item.description: How to enable ADB on a Lenovo A7600-F TAB A10, even though they haven't released official drivers yet.

item.title: Rough guide on manually setting up Git on Windows
item.description: Rough guide on how to manually install Git on Windows.

item.title: Converting from Subversion to Git on Windows
item.description: Windows Git support sucks. Here's what I ended up doing over the course of a couple hours.

item.title: Windows Phone 7: Taking and restoring a SQL database
item.description: As I develop my first Windows Phone 7 application, My Video Game Tracker, I want to make sure that the many games I've added won't accidentally be lost (as I'm deploying test versions to my physical phone).

item.title: Script to simplify Netflix activity pages (in progress)
item.description: I love Netflix, but there's no easy way to get a listing of the movies I've rated through the service. To ease with that, I've finally started on a script that will clean the Netflix output, so it's a bit easier to parse.

item.title: Migration from CollabNet Subversion to VisualSVN Server
item.description: Basic steps to migrate from CollabNet Subversion to VisualSVN Server.

item.title: mvc-mini-profiler for users in a particular role
item.description: mvc-mini-profiler is pretty slick, and extremely easy to add.

item.title: How to easily clear the window.applicationCache on select browsers
item.description: How to 'easily' clear application cache (cache manifest) data for Chrome, and Safari on i-devices.

item.title: Raw: Using OpenSSL to create a certificate authority and update IIS 7.5
item.description: A raw dump of information on how to create a certificate authority and etcetera.

item.title: Getting started with StatSVN (0.7.0) and CollabNet Subversion Server
item.description: While a tool like TortoiseSVN allows limited reporting on Subversion repositories, using a tool like StatSVN generates much more useful reports.
